channel.title: Project Enra - Offical Thread | Updated 7/28
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img169.imageshack.us/img169/4437/deve.png[/img][/center] [u]What we have:[/u]
[ul][li]A dedicated website and host.[/li] [li]Decent client.[/li][/ul]
[u]What we need:[/u]
[ul][li]Some staff[/li] [li]A vps or dedicated host for the server.[/li][/ul]
If you have any of these please PM me or post on the thread. [u]Devolpment Team:[/u] [quote="Newty"]As long as it doesn't break any rules, go ahead.[/quote]
[ul][li]Web Designer, and server and client coder, Stupit[/li][/ul]
[u]Spots Currently Open[/u]
[ul][li]1 Server Coder[/li] [li]1 Client Coder[/li] [li]1 Web Programmer[/li] [li]2 Graphics Artists[/li][/ul]
And more to come. [u]To apply:[/u] [code]Name: Experience: Position: Bio:[/code] [b]Our Auto Downloader[/b] [img]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/932/autodownload.png[/img]

item.title: Project Enra - Offical Thread | Updated 7/28
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

Name: Jake
Experience:
[ul][li]Really good, I was the web designer for "Bring back 06 RuneScape(Failed, nobody was active.)[/li]
[li]Was the web designer for a server called AngelzOfDeath(It is a sponsored server on the Mopar status page, we gave up on that though.)[/li]
[li]And finally I have been practicing web designing in all of my spare time for about a year now, so I think I will be able to pull through on this project.[/li][/ul]

Position: Web Designer
Bio: I really love to web design, mostly because I really loved to get praised for my work. I also REALLY love to help people because of that same feeling I get when I get good feedback from my work that I do. I really feel as though I would be a good web designer for you.

`Jake

Read full topic
